title: New: M o t h e r – Victim
body:
The latest Neon Gold affiliated act to smash the blogs, Brooklyn outfit **M o t h e r** feature members of our LA friends NO, as well as a certain Penn Badgley (Gossip Girl, John Tucker Must Die… films, not bands).

New track _Victim_ is a raw, R&B number, from the same school as the likes of Oceaån and Ben Khan, bold and cinematic yet with more of a delicately unrefined edge. And a saxophone. Check it out below.
